author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES DISCONTINUED FOR ALL OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES DISCONTINUED FOR ALL OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 2:00 AM MST Wed Jul 02 the center of Flossie was located near 18.6, -108.3 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 962 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES DISCONTINUED FOR ALL OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 2:00 AM MST Wed Jul 02 the center of Flossie was located near 18.6, -108.3 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 962 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
